title: Rajputi Chandrika Haaram: Ruby and Polki Diamond Grandeur
materials: Pear-shaped Rubies with Excellent Color Saturation
South Sea Pearls. Gold weight approx 150g. Diamond weight approx 30cts. All materials are ethically sourced.
features: This exquisite Chandrika Haaram showcases a breathtaking array of Polki diamonds set in a Kundan style, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad. The necklace features a floral-motif choker style neckline, followed by multiple cascading pendants of teardrop rubies surrounded by Polki diamonds. Each pendant is adorned with delicate clusters of South Sea pearls, adding a touch of classic elegance. The piece is inspired by Rajputi jewelry designs, with a modern touch. The 'Jadau' technique is used in the setting, giving the piece an antique and royal feel.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (from Polki diamonds)
with vibrant Ruby red accents and the soft luster of South Sea Pearls.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations such as weddings (Vivaham)
and other special occasions like Seemantham (Baby Shower)
and Half-Saree function. It is also a statement piece for upscale evening galas and cultural events.
description: This Chandrika Haaram is a true testament to the rich heritage of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of Polki diamonds, vibrant rubies, and lustrous pearls creates a mesmerizing effect that will make you the center of attention. Its timeless design ensures that it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The intricate details and meticulous craftsmanship make it a valuable investment as well as a stunning piece of jewelry. The Hyderabadi polish provides superior luster and durability.
